This section allows you to automatically handle certain messages you send, based on who you are sending the message to. For each user or usergroup to setup, first enter the user(group)'s name, submit the form, then choose how you want your own copy of the message handled.

Sending a message to multiple users and/or usergroups could cause multiple rules to apply. Archive-wise, if any rule would cause your message to be archived, then the message will be archived. As for getting the message:
if any rule is set to send you a CC of the message, then you'll get a copy; otherwise,
if any rule is set to ignore your own message, then you won't get a copy.

  • (remove setting) - deletes your setting for this user or usergroup
  • normal - normal handling; use this to temporarily disable special handling for this user or usergroup
  • always CC self
  • never /msg self
  • set archived
  • CC but archived
